00056 #ifndef IMPACT_TRACE_H
00057 #define IMPACT_TRACE_H
00058 
00059 /* 10/29/02 REK Adding config.h */
00060 #include <config.h>
00061 #include <library/graph.h>
00062 
00063 #if 0
00064 SAM 1 - 94
00065 #define BEST_TRACE_PROB         0.7
00066 #endif
00067 #define BEST_TRACE_PROB         0.55
00068 #define SELECT_BY_NODE_WEIGHT   0
00069 #define SELECT_BY_ARC_WEIGHT    1
00070 #define SELECT_BY_MIN_PROB      2
00071 #define SELECT_BY_MAX_ARC       3
00072 #define W_A             0       /* terminal to terminal */
00073 #define W_B             1       /* terminal to middle */
00074 #define W_C             2       /* middle to terminal */
00075 #define W_D             3       /* middle to middle */
00076 #define W_E             4       /* in-trace */
00077 #define W_BACK_EDGE     5       /* inner loop back-edge (part of W_A) */
00078 #define W_SEQUENTIAL    6       /* sequential transitions (except last node) */
00079 #define N_NODES         7       /* total number of nodes */
00080 #define W_NODES         8       /* total node weight */
00081 #define N_ARCS          9       /* total number of arcs */
00082 #define W_ARCS          10      /* total arc weight */
00083 #define N_TRACE         11      /* total number of traces */
00084 #define L_TRACE         12      /* average trace length */
00085 #define N_LOOP          13      /* total number of loops */
00086 #define L_LOOP          14      /* average loop length */
00087 #define N_ROOT          15      /* number of nodes with no predecessor */
00088 #define N_LEAF          16      /* number of nodes with no successor */
00089 #define TRECORD_SIZE    17

00096   extern void TraceSelection (FGraph graph, int method, double min_prob);

00102 
00103 /*
00104  *      Two fields in the _Node structures are modified
00105  *      by trace selection. The (type) field is set to
00106  *      the trace_id. For each graph, each trace is assigned
00107  *      an unique identifier. The (status) field is set
00108  *      to the union of one or more of the below flags.
00109  *      ReportSelectionResult() function destroys the VISITED bits.
00110  */
00111 #define NOT_VISITED     0
00112 #define VISITED         1
00113 #define TRACE_HEAD      2
00114 #define TRACE_TAIL      4
00115 #define LOOP_HEAD       8
00116 /*
00117  *      The (type) field of the _Arc structures are also
00118  *      modified. It is used in the trace selection algorithm.
00119  *      After trace selection, the (type) field is 0 if it is
00120  *      not an in-trace transition. For in-trace transition,
00121  *      the (type) field is set to the trace_id.
00122  */
00123 
00124 #endif
